Scene:
Terutora Serves a Meal
(Terutora haizen / 輝虎配膳)

Play: The Battle of Kawanakajima (信州川中島合戦)

Production: April 1980



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Midoridayū (竹本緑大夫)

Toyotake Tokutayū (豊竹十九大夫)



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Kichinosuke (see also Takezawa Yasaburō) (野澤吉之助)

Takezawa Danroku VIII (see also Tsuruzawa Kanji VII) (竹沢団六 (八))



Other Musicians (Koto/Kokyu):

()
